label: flute songs
description: Four pieces for flute and voice composed between 1985-2018 by Mary Jane Leach, a pivotal part of NYC’s pioneering avant-garde community since the 1970s and an active member of the legendary DownTown Ensemble, working alongside peers including Arthur Russell, Ellen Fullman, Peter Zummo, Philip Corner and Arnold Dreyblatt, as well as devoting years... more

‘Thresholder’ is another magisterial offering from Ian William Craig on FatCat’s 130701 sub-label, leading on from the ‘Centres’ [2016] album and a pair of 2017 singles with the Canadian artist’s signature sense of tempered ecstasy.

Now established as a significant figure in the cross-over fields between modern classical, ambient, and the avant-garde... more
